snippet.title: ⭐ Super Mario 64 - Ultra 64 Mario Bros. - Open Beta 1 - 4K
snippet.description:
▶▶▶Patreon◀◀◀
https://www.patreon.com/unrealyoutube/
▶▶▶Twitter◀◀◀
https://twitter.com/Unreal_64
▶▶▶My PC◀◀◀
https://www.amazon.com/shop/unreal

*I used the same controller to control both characters.

"The goal of this project is to create a mod for Super Mario 64 that reintroduces Luigi into the game as a unique playable character with his own moves, animations, and voice clips, add split screen two player multiplayer,  and attempt to faithfully and accurately recreate Super Mario 64 as it would have been if Luigi had remained in the game. Keep in mind this mod is intended for N64/Emulator. We may or may not do the PC port as well."

Download:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/2i1q7nd93p15ayh


***Credits***

Render96 Team: Tools
Kaze Emanuar: Programming, minor feedback
Inky: Models, title screen logo, textures, HUD coin icon
Marshivolt/FluffaLuigi: Models
MM: Project lead 1
SunlitSpace542: Project lead 2, preliminary work on Luigi head for Goddard screen,
programming, server icon, importing title logo
Andrat: Old Luigi Voice and artwork, creating the original title logo seen in early renders for this project
PimpUigi: Beta testing and concepts/feedback, Project lead 3
MohjinTehDohjin: Artist, Feedback
BigMacJam: Current Luigi voice
Stix: Sound design
Remy: Sprites and additional artwork.
AloXado320: Programming, maintaining the code repo
RetroReboot: Music
P0PPY/ElectroMew: Designing the title screen Luigi head
Cheezepin/Arthurtilly/AWiseGuyEh: Motos port to decomp
Alieneer: Ice Motos model
Yoshi Milkman: Blargg model
-Special Thanks-
Nintendo: Making the original game
Anonymous Nintendo Leaker(s): for leaking the partial SM64 source code which contained Luigi's model. Without that leak, we would not be here today.
N64Decomp Team: Starting the effort to reverse engineer Super Mario 64.


#sm64 #supermario64 #mod #4k #luigi #gameplay #unreal #n64 #romhack #nintendo64 #ultra64mariobros #U64MB #beta
